titleStmt.title: The frame of the government of the province of Pennsilvania in America together with certain laws agreed upon in England by the governour and divers free-men of the aforesaid province : to be further explained and confirmed there by the first provincial council and General Assembly that shall be held, if they see meet.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: The preface and the "Frame of government" are signed: William Penn.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
